CardClash.title: Card Clash
CardClash.description: A simple unity game integrated into a simple Blazor application with a .NET Web Core API as the backend with a PostgreSQL database.

MiniQuest.title: Mini Quest
MiniQuest.description: A web-based rouge-like 2D short game with authentication and authorization. Built with: NextJs, NodeJs, ExpressJS, MongoDB.

CSharpAcademy.title: CSharp Academy
CSharpAcademy.description: All the projects I've done from the C# Academy

AssemblyLine.title: Assembly Line
AssemblyLine.description: A simulation of an assembly line with a number of stations. All done in C++.

LegoCollection.title: Lego Collection
LegoCollection.description: A NodeJS application to show, update, create and delete lego sets. Built with: NodeJS and NeonDB

ParkingSimulator.title: Django Parking Simulator API
ParkingSimulator.description: A backend API for accessing and  managing parking spots and logging in. Provides parking spots, reserving a spot, and content management.

JavaGame.title: Java 2D Dungeon Crawler (ish) Game
JavaGame.description: My first ever comparatively big application in Java, a 2D game made with just Java

TaxFilling.title: Tax Filing Management Application
TaxFilling.description: A tax filing management application made with Android Studio and Java. Customers & Admins can login and register, and admins can manage customers.

CookingApp.title: Cooking Instrucional App
CookingApp.description: A cooking instructions app where users can view and cook specific foods from the app. Made via Android Studio and Java
